rComments: Jennifer is a very knowledgeable professor, however she gives a lot of information that may be hard to grasp. She puts up her lecture slides online but if you don't attend class, you will most likely have no idea what the slides are talking about. If you miss more than two lectures, your life will become tough. Be prepared to study a lot for exams.

Jennifer was awesome! Her material was rather difficult, she expects her students to work hard and come to class prepared regarding readings. Final was okay,gave us a set of 4 essay questions to study from than picked 2 of the essays to test us on. If you are interested in Middle Eastern history and willing to put in the effort you'll love it!

Disorganized and unprofessional. 24 hours before final you will still be in the dark about more than half of your grade percentages. Derr did however, have time to send out a music link to Rock the Casbah. Teacher Assistant was condescending and narcissistic. Papers were graded as if they were your senior thesis. Pass on this teacher!

Derr is good when it comes down to her knowledge about the middle east but lacks in structuring a class. It seems that she's absentminded because she promises one thing but doesn't follow through. Her iClicker quizzes are annoying and at times her class is really boring. I suggest another class if you want to do well. She's overrated.

Her iClicker quizzes are very annoying and she really tries to trick you, leading to a many frustrating wrong answers, even if you read the text. She is very knowledgeable, but she basically talks the entire class period and her slides are useless if you do not listen intently to her. Class is easy for History majors, would not reccomend as a GE.

Prof. Derr is enthusiastic about teaching and knowledgeable in her field. She has a kind demeanor, isn't afraid to challenge students, and welcomes comments and discussion during her lectures. This all said, her expectations for students (e.g. through reading of texts and use of I>clicker technology) can be a bit aggrieving. Material was easy.

Love her! Really engaging and interesting. iClicker quizzes helped me to opt out of the final, which was awesome. Got A's on everything but the class average was like a D. Maybe I was just an overeager freshman when I took the class but it definitely was not difficult... Subject matter was really important & she knew her stuff!
Awesome teacher! Really loved her subject. I was a horrible student thank god her iClicker quizzes helped opt out of the final. She is a great person!
